---
name: Security Report
about: Report a security issue (use private channels)
title: "[Security]: "
labels: ["security"]
---

Do not disclose security issues in public.

Please report vulnerabilities via:

- GitHub Security Advisories: https://github.com/yeongseon/azure-functions-openapi/security/advisories/new
- Email: yeongseon.choe@gmail.com

If you already reported privately, you can close this issue.
